title: How to engage and motivate learners - Quora

response.answer_text: To engage and motivate learning, one should Sometimes go offtopic and teach things that interests students (may it be astrophysics, black hole, etc) i.e interesting facts thus keeping yourself and students engage in the process of continuous reading and learning.Crack jokes to rejuvenate class during some boring lectures.Give breaks during long classes, as it is a scientific fact that concentration drops exponentially.One should never stick to the syllabus and teach things he/she finds is lacking in the class.

I do some things that I think helps motivate learners: be patient, never get worried about them or their pacerespond in time keep my commitmentsnever say anything that hurts themsay things as they are and explain the impact of their actions on their life and workmake simple action plans and help them implement and see success
